description:
Lightweight jacket or super-warm shirt? This wool shirt is a perfect example of why the shirt-jac became a cold-weather staple. Crafted from a soft wool blend and accented with Fjallraven’s signature G-1000 Eco fabric, the Canada Shirt is the next evolution of the classic lumberjack plaid.

  • Wool and nylon blend is warm and soft
  • Deep dual chest pockets with snap closures keep small necessities close
name: Fjallraven Canada Shirt Long Sleeve - Women's
